passage_text: Marleylilly is expanding its Upstate operations with a new corporate facility in Greenville County. $10 million investment creating 69 new jobs. Headquartered Greenville County, Marleylilly was established in 2010. The company’s new Greenville County facility will be located at 300 W. Phillips Road in Greer. Those interested in joining the Marleylilly team should visit the company’s jobs page online. About Marleylilly Marleylilly is an online boutique specializing in monogrammed gifts and accessories.
